channel.title: niranting on Nirant Kasliwal
channel.description: Recent content in niranting on Nirant Kasliwal

item.title: Moving from Engineering to PM: Shreyas Karanth
item.description: Gyan Session with Shreyas Shreyas Karpanth is a Product Manager at Soroco. Before this, he was the fastest growing engineer - going from a fresh grad to a Technical Lead within 3 years of graduation. I asked a bunch of questions why he moved to Product Management What do you love the most? Nirant: What have you loved the most, in transitioning from tech to product? Shreyas: 1. 90% of the articles I read when I was in tech, were “product” articles.

item.title: Ankit Nagori, Co-Founder of Cult
item.description: Last month, I had a chance to talk to Ankit Nagori - the co-founder at Cult or Cure.fit This first appeared on https://niranting.substack.com Transcript Origin Story IIT to Flipkart for 6 years and then left with Mukesh Bansal of Myntra to start Cure.fit Ankit Nagori 0:00 Great. So I think my journey my journey started with Flipkart. That was a couple of years after I finished my undergrad at IIT.
